item.title: LLVM Loop Optimization - Full Unroll
item.description: The For Structure Code Block 多数通用语言的 for loop 具备以下的结构： 1 2 3 for (InitStmt; Condition; IncStmt) { // code block to be executed } 注：for range 是语言层面对于迭代器封装的语法糖。 结合 for 的上下文，可以

item.title: LLVM编码规范(译)
item.description: LLVM Coding Standards(LLVM编码规范) [TOC] Introduction(简介) This document attempts to describe a few coding standards that are being used in the LLVM source tree. Although no coding standards should be regarded as absolute requirements to be followed in
